data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dios, Rodrigo de Vilhena Perez, Santis, Marcelo Domingos de (2019): A new synonym for Zelia Robineau-Desvoidy, 1830 (Diptera, Tachinidae), the genus Opsozelia Townsend, 1919, with the description of three new species. ZooKeys 880: 113-133, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.880.35482, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.880.35482
